noWhatsappException: the number provided is no registered on Whatsapp
usedException: this model is used and can't be deleted
conflictException: there is a conflic while doing this operation (user already exists)
onlineOfflineException: can't change state while on a trip
noDriverFoundException: sorry, couldn't find a suitable driver
noNullValuesBadRequestException: order contains null fields that are required
tooManyRequestsException: too many requests in limited time
